casebody.data:
Reynaldo ARROYO
v.
COMMISSIONER OF CORRECTION Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided September 13, 2017

Peter G. Billings, in support of the petition.

Bruce R. Lockwood, senior assistant state's attorney, in opposition.

*236The petitioner Reynaldo Arroyo's petition for certification to appeal from the Appellate Court, 172 Conn.App. 442, 160 A.3d 425 (2017), is denied.
